description:
Tis the season for all things that bring good will and full bellies! This year, we’ve brought in the reinforcements that’ll give the troops a fabulous foodie time!
Dan brings the chefs kiss to the Ratlings’ treats in this food filled tutorial!   
Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Black Legion 
Snakebite Leather
Garaghak’s Sewer
Volpus Pink

Base:
Caliban Green
Khorne Red

Layer:
Kakophoni Purple
Moot Green 
Warpstone Glow
Wazdakka Red
White Scar


Shade:
Agrax Earthshade
Biel-Tan Green

Technical:
Contrast Medium 

Tools:
Small Layer SCT
Small Base SCT
XS Artificer Brush

If you're new to painting, our Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WarhammerOfficial/
- X: https://x.com/warhammer
- Warhammer Community: https://www.warhammer-community.com/
- Get War
title: How To Paint: Provisionally Prepared Foods   | Intermediate | Warhammer 40,000
